title: Jane Goodall has died
author: jaredwiener
aiHeadline: Jane Goodall, the legendary chimp whisperer, has passed away, leaving the world to ponder how we'll ever top her groundbreaking discoveries about primate behavior and our own human foibles.

title: Show HN: Autism Simulator
author: joshcsimmons
aiHeadline: A new Autism Simulator is here to 'help,' but let's be real, can a digital experience truly capture the complexity of neurodiversity, or is this just another tech trend that'll be forgotten by next week?

title: CDC File Transfer
author: GalaxySnail
aiHeadline: The CDC has released a file transfer tool, proving once again that even health organizations can't resist the allure of creating yet another app, probably because they ran out of important public health crises to address.

title: I only use Google Sheets
author: mugamuga
aiHeadline: In a world full of spreadsheet options, one person has decided that Google Sheets is the only way to go, and honestly, who can blame them? It's like the ultimate minimalist's toolâ€”simple, functional, and about as exciting as a Monday morning.

title: Don't avoid workplace politics
author: matheusml
aiHeadline: Workplace politics are unavoidable, so instead of trying to dodge them like a boss, the author suggests embracing the chaos, because let's face it, office drama is the real reason we all show up to work every day.
